      • doTCPHandshake

        public void doTCPHandshake(Node currentNode,
                  Node nextHopNode,
                  Datagram datagram)
        Perform TCP handshake between Sender and Receiver Node. Open connection stream between Sender and Receiver. Send datagram between Sender and Receiver via open connection stream. Close the the open stream after communication.
        Parameters:
        currentNode - the sender Node of the network
        nextHopNode - the next hop Node in the network
        datagram - the datagram require to send between Sender and Receiver
